author: COMSOL
description: This model verifies that the onset of streamer formation between two spheres separated by atmospheric pressure dry air at a distance of 2 cm occurs at 51.8 kV. The electrical breakdown is detected by integrating Townsend coefficients along the electric field lines between the two spheres. Once the integrated Townsend coefficient reaches a certain threshold, a streamer will form creating a short circuit.
label: breakdown_between_spheres.mph
name: root
